channel.title: Need a little help with 508
channel.description: I need to know how to change player rights in a 508 server using the ip changer client...

item.title: Need a little help with 508
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Soul_Reaper, post:6, topic:236198”]lol im just beginning at this so i didnt kno allstar is a 317
but hey atleast i tryed to help. :D[/quote]Which was thoughtful, but be sure to know everything required to answer next time. You’re obviously not going to know too much being a beginner, but it was nice that you had the right thought. Btw, 317, 377, 417, 503, 508, etc, they’re the type of client or cache used for the source. 503’s and 508’s re the newer types, like the runescape today.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a little help with 508
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Soul_Reaper, post:2, topic:236198”]just look thru your source files for player rights-0
and change 0 to 3. if your using allstarscape source
then i believe it’s in the character folders.
it shouldnt take that long to find.[/quote]allstar is a 317. He’s talking about a 508, which is based pretty different. It’s kind of ironic how you posted “the way people should help” when you didn’t really read this =\ no offense.

brb on the question btw. i forgot what file it is, but you have to add a name to the method.

edit:

kihomura:

login.java.

There it is. then look for the player rights, and add the name under it. it’s most likely going to be umair or palidino, so change that name you yours if you want admin.

Read full topic

Allstar-Scape is a 317, he has a 508. Not even close to being the same.

item.title: Need a little help with 508

item.description:
@Soul_Reaper1 wrote:

just look thru your source files for player rights-0
and change 0 to 3. if your using allstarscape source
then i believe it’s in the character folders.
it shouldnt take that long to find.
